```{r}

library(tidyverse)

d1 <- read_delim("res-r3-xgboost.csv", delim=":", 
        col_names = c("instance","tool","cpucores","runtime")) 
d2 <- read_delim("res-x1-xgboost.csv", delim=":", 
        col_names = c("instance","tool","cpucores","runtime")) 
d <- rbind(d1, d2)

cpucores_order <- unique(d$cpucores)

d %>% mutate(cpucores=factor(cpucores, levels=cpucores_order)) %>% 
  filter(cpucores %in% c("0-3","0-7","0-15","0-31","0-63","0-127")) %>% 
  mutate(ncores = as.numeric(gsub(".*-","",cpucores))+1) %>% 
  ggplot() + geom_boxplot(aes(x = cpucores, y = runtime, color = instance)) +
  ylim(c(0,NA)) + geom_hline(aes(yintercept = min(runtime)), color = "grey60")

```
